condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: By the end of 2021, communities, consisting of families/ caregivers, men, women, children and adolescents adopt positive behavioral that contribute to the child survival, protection and development throughout the country.

description.narrative: UNICEF Sudan's C4D Strategy, a first, serves to integrate existing community platforms for sustainable and long-term change. The approach represents a commitment to addressing demand-side barriers more comprehensively and moving away from ad hoc activities and campaigns to a more strategic, evidence-based approach in order to support the change process and sustain achieved results. In partnership with the Health Promotion Unit and other NGOs the first C4D Task Force in Sudan was launched to lead and coordinate an evidence generation process and engagement activities which lead to behavioural and social change. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

title.narrative: Evaluations for priority C4D interventions planned, designed and budgeted
A budgeted C4D plan in place.

actual.value: 2019:The C4D strategy and workplan is in place
